flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour = <<60=60>>60 minutes.
We convert the time to hours, so 42 minutes = 42/60 hours = 42/60 hours.
So in 42 minutes, the distance the bus traveled in miles is 50 * (42/60) = <<50*(42/60)=500/7>>500/7 miles.
#### 500/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 500/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
